Title: Digital Back-Propagation Performance in Wideband Optical Fibre Transmission Systems
Abstract: © 2017 IEEE.Single channel digital back-propagation (SC-DBP) performance with different transmission bandwidths is experimentally and theoretically investigated. The SC-DBP gain reduces with transmission bandwidth; from 1.2 b/sym for single channel to 0.2 b/sym for C-band transmission at 2000 km.
